local_intent: Perceive the white plate, move above it, perform approach-and-align (with one retry), and verify at-target
assumptions: white_plate is visible in the camera frame
collision-free path exists above the white_plate
robot base and gripper are operational
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: verifies visibility, executes the MoveAbove leaf, aligns/approaches (with retry for robustness), and verifies arrival before grasp.
